lender.name: Kiefer Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in the power of micro loans and the human connection between us all.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business with nine other people designing industrial kitchens

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Muhammed Unus and his Grameen Bank.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: the growth of small businesses is what fuels an economy, a country, and a person's dreams. There is no better gift than giving someone the chance to make their dream a reality.

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: There is no easier way to make a difference for someone who is willing to work hard. I can join others to create a lasting impact. What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I help my company understand laws and regulations relating to environmental protection.

lender.name: Grace
lender.occupational_info: I am a mural painter. I especially like to paint children's themes in schools and hospitals.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Strong local businesses make strong communities, and strong communities make life better for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying biology and medicine.

lender.name: Gavin & Carolyn
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are fortunate enough to be able to give back. And really get great joy out of helping others.

lender.name: Jaspers Buddy
lender.loan_because: One act of kindness can change a life. Lets change the world one person at a time!

lender.name: steve
lender.occupational_info: I am an Interior Designer: I create infrastructure for living/working

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it's exciting to watch people's businesses grow.
lender.occupational_info: I help lawyers maintain their professional skills.

lender.name: ClemsonONE
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students who attend Clemson University in South Carolina.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is a good way to give back and it's helping people start businesses and/or make positive change in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell chemicals.

lender.name: Barstow Brownies
lender.loan_because: We want to reach out across the world to help others break through the poverty line.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help enable others who have a strong desire to succeed but just need a little help along the way.

lender.name: Jay & Randy, Dubai 07
lender.loan_because: I needed help once and it was there. I started my own business and was very blessed. Now I can spend lots of time with my wife & kids. To me that is the greatest success.
lender.occupational_info: I travel the world so don't be surprised if i show up to see you.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me and I want to share the harvest.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business that manufactures wood cabinets for the commercial and medical field.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I try and help people connect to the earth.

lender.name: David & Kari Neth
lender.occupational_info: Teaching children to be confident in themselves through the art of dance.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been a tourist in South and Central America and want to support the wonderful people there.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I used to work in the computer department of an oil company.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have the privilege of living in relative luxury while other people in the world struggle just to survive. I have been blessed by the universe with bounty, and so I share with my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I am a cook in the US Coast Guard. I cook for the crew of a buoy tender that does environmental, security, and search and rescue work for people in distress.

lender.name: Kara F
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of giving and entrepreneurship

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I desire to share my material blessings with those less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: My father and I are partners in a hearing aid business.

lender.name: herbie
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in the world I live in, to promote both physical and mental health of individuals and from that grow healthy communities
lender.occupational_info: I help research the causes of stroke, to understand what is happening during a stroke and in time, that should lead to discoveries that reduce the injuries people suffer.

lender.name: hemi
lender.loan_because: I can do it right now, remembering people helped me with lovely smiles.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Japanese-Korean language interpreter, also a marketer. Now I am staying in the U.S to study language. Learning something new is very exciting to me!

lender.name: melody
lender.loan_because: I care. Yoga is more than just practicing asana (yoga poses). It's also about performing self-less service (karma yoga) and helping others shine.
lender.occupational_info: My company is abellaYoga. I am a traveling yoga teacher. I go to homes to teach private yoga classes (one-to-one). I also travel to companies to teach yoga to groups of employees during lunch or after work. I love what I do!

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: To give others a chance to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in retail as a manager for over 39 years.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I give a voice to the voiceless.

lender.name: Phones 4 Loans
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to put the "triple bottom line" into action: people, planet, and profit.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Colorado State University business class studying social and sustainable entrepreneurship. Phones4Loans is a class project with the purpose of generating funds for Kiva entepreneurs by collecting unwanted cell phones and accessories from the community and either recycling them responsibly or reselling them for cash to fund Kiva loans.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I wan to help
lender.occupational_info: I am biologist

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It is imperative to re-distribute the wealth, and bring into balance the economic realities of the human condition.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph architecture; the exterior and interiors of buildings. I work for designers, architects, magazine and resorts around the world.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I like to learn math. I like to build things. I like gymnastics and playing the violin.

lender.name: Mavis
lender.loan_because: I'm so happy to helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a US company which located in China. I don't earn a lot from my work but I know there are many people need help.

lender.name: Jihye
lender.loan_because: The money I loan will be used more efficiently and purposefully than it would be used if I had it in my hands.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: To contribute to the elimination of poverty in developing countries by encouraging initiative and promoting equality of opportunity
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies do business in the Middle East

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: As a woman and former small business owner, I know first hand the difference a woman can make in the lives of her family.
lender.occupational_info: Nursing student

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to increase opportunity for underprivileged people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Internet marketing.

lender.name: Siew Yong
lender.loan_because: Sharing and helping make me a happier person.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be the best they can be to themselves and their family, and I believe we learn by what people do, not so much by what they say. I'm grateful that my family and I have both had such chances and recently discovered Kiva so that we can try to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a consumer electronics distribution business on a national basis.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do. Perhaps the IMF/World Bank/G8 countries would like to join in, in some meaningful way?

lender.name: Bayo
lender.loan_because:
I want to be a blessing to total strangers who may not have any other alternatives to obtain capital for investment in their businesses.
I also believe that the standard of living in the community that the borrower lives in improves as more people are empowered to be successful in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to be more productive using computers

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a meaningful difference in peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I proofread banking documents that are translated from Japanese to English.

lender.name: Lena
lender.occupation: M Sc in Industrial Engineering and Management
lender.loan_because: Great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Group manager at IT company

lender.name: Ankit
lender.loan_because: I want to statrt a Hindi Blog. Which Will try to teach People How To Perform Any Things Well.

lender.name: Partha
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work among the very poor tribal people living in the forest and hills of Bankura district of west bengal state in India

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I set up parties and weddings at an ocean front hotel in Hawaii. I also have a small business where I take people out surfing, and take pictures and videos of them surfing.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Michele Baer
lender.loan_because: I'm part of a family of entrepreneurs. What a joy it is to have your family working with you every day! I also know very well the incredible amount of work it takes to start and maintain a business of your own. Kiva is making dreams come true and spreading the joy of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: My family owns a surf shop in South Florida, Coastal Surf & Ski. I also own a Web Development business and a handmade silver jewelry business. My husband, sons, daughter-in-laws and grand-daughters all work together on all of our projects and day to day shop management. Fantastic!

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I love to help people in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Christian Institute, in student financials.

lender.name: Nery
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I perform various tests on blood and other bodily fluids in a laboratory in a hospital.

lender.name: Mikko
lender.loan_because: I get repaid!

lender.name: Lisa Hackett
lender.loan_because: I have the privilege to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make drinks for tourists who dine at the 360 restaurant in the CN Tower, Toronto.

lender.name: Rev. Francis
lender.loan_because: We needed a loan to expend our farms
lender.occupational_info:
The COMPASSION EVANGELISTIC TEAM initiates and undertakes community development projects that are aimed at teaching the people to be self-reliant so as to be able to help themselves and others.
Our community development projects includes the following 1. Health, Medical and Sanitation: Under this venture we educate the rural poor on good health practices, the role of family planning as a health factor in community development, HIV/AIDS awareness creation and preventive measures.
2. Farming and Agro-Processing: The 21st century is presenting the world with major challenges in agriculture production. The rural poor who forms the bulk of the worlds population always finds it difficult crossing the informational gap to have adequate access to information regarding modern good farming practices. Wings of Love strive to bridge the information gap by making available at the doorsteps of the rural poor information regarding good farming methods, more yielding crops and also helps them initiate agro processing ventures to add value to their farm produce.
3. Creating small scale industries: We believe there will not be any meaningful development without the ability to develop and establish Small Scale Industries that help the rural poor produce some of the products they need regularly thereby creating jobs for the youth. We do our best to identify ventures that will serve the mutual interest of both the community and the investor.
4. Establishing Libraries: Vital Information, the key to sustainable development is lacking in many African Communities. We try to address this situation by providing libraries for communities and donate books to school libraries especially those in the rural communities.
5. Providing recreational facilities for the youth of low-income communities. The U.N convention on children clearly gives and established the right of children to play. Many children in developing countries are denied this very important right. CET will always seek to address these issues.
6. Providing Quality education opportunities for the innocent children that find themselves in the deprived communities we reach. In many communities Wings of Love have visited children have to walk several miles in other to attend school. The smaller kids have to wait and grow till they can really make the daily journey to school on their own. This has resulted in many kids not been able to make it to school at all. We work with the communities to provide quality education for the innocent children whose desire is to go to school.
7. Providing training opportunities though the establishment of Vocational and Trade learning institutions.
8. Working in partnership with other like minded organizations that seeks to improve the living conditions of all mankind
These projects and programs will always be designed to improve on the general quality of life in the communities in which they are situated.

lender.name: Jen & Alex
lender.loan_because: it is a faith commitment to seek justice & peace, to respect human dignity and to help empower people to use their gifts in a way that benefits not just them but their communities

lender.name: Marissa & Mark
lender.loan_because: We really believe in the organization that is Kiva. We are full-time students and we don't have much to offer. But the little we can offer makes a small difference in the lives of others...that's important to us.
lender.occupational_info:
Marissa-I am a nursing student and a massage therapist. I love helping people feel better.
Mark is an engineering student and an automobile mechanic. He wants to help solve problems that will make the world run a bit smoother.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to do the same!
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing, Metal Stamping

lender.name: Our Savior Lutheran
lender.loan_because: We loan because as Junior High and High School youth we feel that we were called by our faith in God to help make this world a better place. We have taken Micah's Challenge to seek justice and show mercy and walk humbly with God.
lender.occupational_info: Our work as a church youth group is to learn to live responsibly in this world. To see others as brothers and sisters.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: there is no greater thing to invest in than the human race and the betterment of our worldly society.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give back
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals & teams who are typically going through difficult & intense times, up to & including crisis. I support them in cultivating the opportunities created in those extreme circumstances.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be comfortable in my life and want to help others live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a variety of jobs for local government.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 tells us "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but worked for my state government legislature.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Most financial aid sent directly to 3rd world countries is abused by corrupt governments. Microloans sent directly to the people help lift a country out of the third world from the bottom up.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in selling luxury furniture that no one really needs to people with more money than they deserve.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward - every individual's success is success for us all.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the State administering a program that funds environmental clean-ups. I also am an entrepeneur and have an internet business which allows people to host their own website & advertise their own businesses (blogging etc).

lender.name: Andy
lender.occupational_info: I make hand made violins and I play the violin.

lender.name: jeanne
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large daily newspaper writing stories about interesting people and events.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their heart desires
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in the process of awakening to their true self.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I try to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage property to upgrade and improve buildings, houses and other structures.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.occupational_info: I manage websites for a Hollywood film studio.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: Leigh Anne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly and I want to share what He has given me with others.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: If I can't do big things, I can at least do little things with great love.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare new teachers to go scrape some crud off this crazy, graced world.

lender.name: Tavane
lender.loan_because: I lend because the people participating in the kiva project are ambitious, hard working people who need a little support. The amount of money that most of them need is nothing to what we waste on silly things every day.
lender.occupational_info: I work at one of the largest banks in the world. I support corporate customer in the money management and cash flow needs.

lender.name: AndreaRae
lender.loan_because: We are one

lender.name: Despina
lender.loan_because: we all have an obligation to step back and lend a hand to those behind us. No matter how badly off we think we are - help the ones worse of than you.

lender.name: Okenji
lender.loan_because: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. - Buddha
lender.occupational_info: A vegetarian Buddhism who is inspired by the code of bushido: Justice, benevolence, love, sincerity, honesty, and self-control in utmost respect.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: We adopted our son from Guatemala and want to lend a hand to people in Guatemala
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, running a training program for students who want to make the world a better place for children and families (by applying research to public policy)

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to share.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves being creative and spontaneous. If you see a home, office, castle or other environment that actors are in I've helped to create that world. I have the good fortune of using my imagination regularly.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Isidoro
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is what drives capitalism to succeed. It is what will pull the developing world out of 'development.'

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: it empowers and enables people to remain/become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I revitalize neighborhoods.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am also a father, husband and entrepreneur! I am thrilled to be a part of person-to-person micro-lending and supporting sustainable development. My loans are biased towards women and women's groups.
lender.occupational_info: I am the managing directory of a consultancy in Toronto, Canada that helps our clients bridge the gap between business needs and technology by providing research, strategy, implementation and support services.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: it is a way I can use the gifts I have been given in ways that will bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a college student studying religion and English, and I have hopes to be a person that promotes peace, love, and community (that's the goal at least).

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I like people who work and know the value of integrity.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can, and a handful of pounds here means a lot more to someone else. It's not a sacrifice for me but it is a lifeline for someone else. Oh and I love the idea of low-risk low-value high-impact life-changing microcredit.
lender.occupational_info: Satisfying, but working in marketing makes other companies money and is not "giving back" which is what I'd ideally like to do.

lender.name: TeleFlow
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea, and similar to why we created TeleFlow. By empowering people to help themselves, we create a society where people are sucessful and self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: We created TeleFlow, and application development toolkit, that allows developers to create, test and deploy their own telephony applications.

lender.name: Moritz
lender.loan_because: It's very cool, to see, that small helps, that don't hurt any lender, can help. It has only advantages.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Physics in Frankfurt, Germany.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping developing nations is more than just giving cash away and giving them equipment. Aid has to be sustainable, and by helping these people improve their lives with micro loans, we're promoting an environment where they'll take matters into their own hands.

lender.name: Angela
lender.occupation: Development Assistant at Social Service Agency

lender.name: KUBALEK
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to relieving others of the humiliation and pain of extreme poverty, and to foster entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Marcella
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference in someone's life at a rate I can afford.
lender.occupational_info: In my 80 years I have been blessed to work and travel in many places in the world as an Army Officer, College Professor and Social Worker to name a few of the hats I have worn. I still work in my daughter's firm where she reimbursed all her staff for the first loan we made. There was always a helping hand in our lives. I have been a volunteer and love passing the word about Kiva as an alternative to giving nonlasting gifts to friends and relatives,

lender.name: Melyssa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, and this is a way to make a difference.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunities and freedoms that I have in Canada.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer and designer and I also sell photobooks, greeting cards and other photo-based products on my website. My stock photography is available through several royalty free distributors. I am a member of the Microstock Group Lending Team.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Others need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Bruce
lender.occupation: Author of \"The Giving Zone\" and Speaker

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, to all the people you can, as long as you ever can. John Wesley
lender.occupational_info: Face painting, teaching art and craft classes, volunteering.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I sincerely care about people and want everyone to have a chance at success. I especially admire those who can turn a negative situation into a challenge and learn from experience.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupation: own small trucking business with my husband.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: people need a little help.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business which I run out of my home. I manage the careers of musicians, helping them with publicity; promoting their music and finding them work.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: SoulVoyagers
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of lending money where it can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of spiritual women that meet weekly to discuss issues of personal and world peace.

lender.name: Appropedia Friend
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do with capital I accumulate.
lender.occupational_info: I design and engineer open source appropriate technology to help build a sustainable world.

lender.name: Topher Hamblett
lender.occupation: President, The Foundation for West Africa
lender.loan_because: economic self-sufficiency is about individuals and families working their way out of deep poverty. It is about intiative and hope.
lender.occupational_info: My work is about supporting West African-led efforts to achieve lasting peace and prosperity. The Foundation for West Africa supports the start-up of community radio stations, and local initiative in health care and education.

lender.name: Shelley & Robert
lender.loan_because: We are very excited to contribute to small business owners who are willing to share there dreams with the rest of the world and impact and improve their local community.
lender.occupational_info: We manage Top Climb Publishing which owns web sites and search hot-sheets that provide internet users ways to find the specific information, product or service they are seeking on the Internet. We strive to provide relevant, simple and most importantly, helpful ways for people to find the resources they need to solve problems and accomplish their goals!

lender.name: Cori & Tim
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by others who have helped us and we feel strongly that the best thing to do is to pass that along.
lender.occupational_info: We record and report business transactions for the companies that we work for.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because:
"If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth." 1 John 3:17-18
"...to loose the chains of injustice and untie the cords of the yoke, to set the oppressed free and break every yoke? Is it not to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter-- when you see the naked, to clothe him, and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood?" Isaiah 58:6-7
Matthew 6:19 Do not lay up for yourselves treasures on earth, where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal; but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in and steal. For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
Matthew 19:21 "... Go, sell your possessions and give to the poor, and you will have treasure in heaven. Then, come, follow me."
Luke 9:23-25 Then he said to them all: "If anyone would come after me, he must deny himself and take up his cross daily and follow me. For whoever wants to save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for me will save it. What good is it for a man to gain the whole world, and yet lose or forfeit his very self?
Hebrews 13:5 Keep your lives free from the love of money and be content with what you have, because God has said, "Never will I leave you; never will I forsake you."
Acts 2:44-45 All the believers were together and had everything in common. Selling their possessions and goods, they gave to anyone as he had need.
"He raises the poor from the dust and lifts the needy from the ash heap; he seats them with princes and has them inherit a throne of honor." 1 Samuel 2:8
"But when you give a banquet, invite the poor, the crippled, the lame, the blind." Luke 14:13
"Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world." James 1:27
lender.occupational_info: I write, perform, and record for my band "The Northern" in New York City.

lender.name: Richard & Mary
lender.loan_because: Jesus calls us to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do computer software support and development for a printing company. My wife provides speech therapy for special needs children in public schools.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am awesome

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I respect those who work hard for themselves and I don't mind trying to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work a bit in different industries. Sometimes I repair or expand homes to make them more useful. I also repair trucks and overseas shipping containers.

lender.name: The Wilsons
lender.loan_because: Our children were each given money to do something good in the world. They chose to combine their money and help someone reach a goal. Perhaps this money will "keep giving" for years to come.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves through entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I stink with money and helping people with theirs is better than buying farkles and doodads.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a county funded hospital mandated to serve people's health needs regardless of their ability to pay. There is emphasis on immigrant, poor, transient, and incarcerated populations. I am trying to get into med school

lender.name: J.P.
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." I know the small amount I contribute will allow businesses to grow and in turn, lift whole communities out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am an economics student.

lender.name: Candace
lender.occupational_info: I work in sustainable fisheries. We work to ensure there are fish left in the oceans for generations to come.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: to help the world around me.

lender.name: Amara
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help great businesses and organizations brand, market, and advertise themselves!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to pay if forward, better peoples live and better the world
lender.occupational_info: I do counseling with people to help guide them on their self awareness journey

lender.name: Action Packed David
lender.loan_because: its easy to do and it helps others...
lender.occupational_info: don't really like "work", rather I work at what I am passionate about...

lender.name: Jeff,Donna,Gabriel
lender.loan_because: We would like to help people. Especially those who are hard workers and can repay the loans so we can help others and pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance industry.

lender.name: margie
lender.loan_because: ... aid ... as an acronym..... access, independence, development. : ) the least i can do is help with access!
lender.occupational_info: when not working in the developed world .. i love to volunteer and travel in the 3rd world

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because:
It is so satisfying and rewarding. Such a small gesture on my part is transformed into real benefits and real assistance in other people's lives. Giving in this way supports my belief in co-operation. The combination of the many being so much greater than I could do on my own.
I always smile when I see my loans repaid to know that history has been repeated in that I have passed on some little of the help I have been given in my life

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in microfinance and I wish to give my little contribution to help who needs it
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher in the field of fair trade and ethical finance, I also work in the Youth Policies Department of a regional public administration in Italy (Puglia)

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who aren't as fortunate as I am achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop computer software for a government agency that provides public assistance to people in need.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to share what I have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain the library's collection of resources to help put knowledge in the hands of the public.

lender.name: C&J
lender.occupation: Being present with Joy and Grace.
lender.loan_because: Life is good.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to move around the planet, the most ancient traveller in the cosmos... LOVE!

lender.name: James M Hill High School
lender.loan_because: The Miramichi Kinsmen Club approached James M Hill High School to participate in the KIVA program. World Issues teacher, Tyson Theriault enthusiastically introduced the concept to his class and they researched different entrepreneur opportunities and decided to lend $500 to two different groups.
lender.occupational_info: The Miramichi Kinsmen Club is a non-profit service club that organizes various fund raising activities and contributes the proceeds back to the community's greatest need.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: Social justice is an important value for me, and I'm convinced that microfinance can really make a difference in lifting people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in a research lab.

lender.name: Jersey Girl
lender.loan_because: I want to....I don't have a lot...but I have more than others...
lender.occupational_info: I work for an airline...and I travel all over the world....

lender.name: Doreen & Hugh
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: It pays some of the bills and is better than a life of crime.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: if the world needs help, it takes a lot of it to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: current military solider

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Kiva struck me as a personal way I could directly help some of the hardworking, abjectly poor, especially in Africa.
lender.occupational_info: My work focuses on projects in the neediest spots in Africa, where frequent travel constantly exposes me to the plight of the majority.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I paint to connect with people, and I launch rockets to pay the bills.

lender.name: Star Straf
lender.loan_because:
People have helped me when I needed it, I try to give to those that I have something in common with, for example my first loan was to a weaver because I have a small loom.
My Kiva Friends http://www.kiva.org/lender/andrew8285 http://www.kiva.org/lender/holly8249
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for a university.

lender.name: Ana Lomba
lender.loan_because: As a small entrepreneur, I know how difficult it is to get started--and how empowering it is as well! I want to help other people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I create materials (fun!) for children to learn new languages or improve their skills in their home languages. I believe that the world would be a better place if we learned to speak with others--in their languages!

lender.name: Maggie & Mario
lender.loan_because: we are all here to help each other and we should pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I collect money from people for product they purchased on credit.

lender.name: Hamel College
lender.loan_because: We care! Kiva gives you the possibility to reach people.Borrowers en entrepreneurs can make a change together.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing knowledge.

lender.name: Debbie and Sox
lender.loan_because: For once in my life, I can! Just want to help out someone in need. I think it's harder to ask for and accept help when you need it the most. I like donating this way as it makes it much more personal. I have been in situations where I needed help and got it. Would like to do the same in return for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am managing a call center for a large pharmaceutical company. We take orders over the phone and process them to our large warehouse.

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: It feels good and I think microlending has macro benefits.
lender.occupational_info: I detect and diagnose disease.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: my stepdaughter introduced me to kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: I provide financial services.

lender.name: Yazcara
lender.loan_because: I am alone with two children, I do work on Real estate and the colapse of the economy let me with no income, Now I do puting a marketing company, what is my career. I can take care of my children and work same time

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: I'm a nice person and want to help people :)

lender.name: Susan Nick
lender.loan_because: a single person can help another with the simple press of a button - People matter, each and every one.
lender.occupational_info: small business accounting services

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to promote entrepreneurship and to give those in third-world and developing countries an opportunity to improve their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate and push paperwork for large commercial real estate loans and asset-based financing.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with much. I want to help other women to feel empowered and to have good self esteem about themselves and to have the ability to take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time cooking,reading, hiking, skiing and traveling. I try to stay active with local charities and non-profits. However, my primary interest is to spend quality time with my husband and my three adult children who live around the world.

lender.name: Istvan
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Saundra
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I'm thankful for what has been given to me in my life and wish to pay it forward

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I would rather spend my money on something worth while than gratuitous materialism
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Marquette University studying history. I plan on teaching at the collegiate level at some point in my life.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to be reasonably successful in business and think micro-lending is a great way to both give back and to help those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Our company facilitates online Employee & Client Satisfaction surveys for professional service firms around the world. The information we provide to business leaders allows them to improve the quality of the service they provide to their clients and make their workplace/culture better for their employees.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a meaningful, positive change in the world and Kiva allows me to do that within my means.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Montessori school. It allows children to learn at their own pace, not racing to keep up with their peers. Children help other children and learn responsibility and self-motivation.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It works.

lender.name: Angelina
lender.loan_because: it is wonderful to know you can help someone so far away.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: My Daddy says it will make a better world for when I grow up.
lender.occupational_info: I make my Mommy and Daddy happy just by being me.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I like helping people better their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and create engaging learning materials for kids on the web.

lender.name: Ashley & Aris
lender.loan_because: Our friend Billy gave us a Kiva gift certificate for our wedding and we are so excited to be able to help individuals around the world with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We design & build websites for small and medium sized businesses. We also do photography, print design, and film production.

lender.name: Tihana
lender.loan_because: Why not?!

lender.name: Kareem Grant
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is a powerful weapon in the fight against poverty.

lender.name: Frozen Spokes
lender.loan_because: We are interested in supporting the uplifting effect micro finance has on those who have the least access to sources of capital. The ancient Chinese philosopher, Lao Tzu, once wrote, "Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for life." Rather than simply donating money to a charity for one-time relief, we want to help fan the flame of human drive and ingenuity and realize the multiplier effect lending has on the communities affected by the borrower.
lender.occupational_info: We manage relationships with companies who bank with us, lend to companies who engage in international trade, and process banking documents associated with trade transactions.

lender.name: Heiko
lender.loan_because: I am convinced Microfinance is a good way of helping people getting fair credits and starting up a business.
lender.occupational_info: Procurement Manager

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I gotta spread the love!

lender.name: The Morris Family
lender.loan_because: I can and should

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: As much as there are things I cannot afford for my family, we live like Kings to many others on this planet and for that I wish to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion and I am working to realise this passion into success.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who works hard and truly responsible.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I love the personalized approach.

lender.name: Jesika Brooks
lender.loan_because: I think it's good to give, especially when you're capable of sharing the wealth. (Heck, it's good to give even when times are tough.)

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make the difference and turn the world in a better place.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: It's an easy, small way that I can make a big difference in someone's life. I also love the grassroots concept of KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I am an oncology nurse (I work with cancer patients)

lender.name: Tire Lyna
lender.loan_because: Lyna Manufacturings mission is to save the earth one tire at a time and to be a global leader in providing value added solutions, help increase the productivity of our customers and decrease the volume of tires being prematurely discarded into landfills each year.
lender.occupational_info: Over seven years of extensive beta testing of the product has been carried out by major tire/retread dealers, government fleets and several commercial fleets (now converting to customers). The test results confirm that Tire Lyna's unique biodegradable gel-based technology, controls air volume / pressure, reduces the operating temperature of tires, operates in extreme temperature variations and significantly reduces maintenance costs, downtime and improves fuel savings without effecting the tire manufacturers warranty.

lender.name: Chaos Girl
lender.loan_because: on the outside, I'm cranky and cynical, but inside I am humbled beyond words when I see how many people, all around the world, are so fiercely determined to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: During the day, I am a secretary at a big corporation. At night, I'm a switchboard operator at a big retail store. And on my nights off, I am a mathematics student at the local college.

lender.name: MacLeod Family
lender.loan_because: We live a privileged life, and would like to help out those less fortunate live a better life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have been given too much and I believe ''less is more''
lender.occupational_info: Help individual, team, organization to be self sustainalbe for now and the future

lender.name: ChaoFa
lender.loan_because: If you haven't any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble. - Bob Hope
lender.occupational_info: Every woman around the world will understand my work. I keep house, I do laundry, I wash dishes and feed our cat and make the meals, and I laugh whenever possible.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I understand the power of micro-finance, and I know that God can do amazing things and can bless so many people through our small acts of faith.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medium-sized office that prepares financial statements, tax returns, and performs audits on local companies.

lender.name: Baylight Church
lender.loan_because: We're following Jesus on his mission for shalom (completeness, wholeness) in the world by giving from that which God has given us.
lender.occupational_info: We're a group of followers of Jesus loving Him and loving our neighbors.

lender.name: Hardcore
lender.loan_because: of solidarity with the human race and my belief that we must create the society we wish to inhabit.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a chemist. I make molecules and groups of molecules, and explore their structures and properties. I explore what they are, how they're put together, and what they can do.

lender.name: Momi
lender.loan_because: I can and because it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.occupational_info: Marketing research firm and women's research panel (ChickChat.net)

lender.name: Raquel
lender.occupational_info: The most important job of my life, being a mom.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and this "micro loan" idea seems like such a great way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their computer problems.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: Working together to make each other's live easier is what its all about.
lender.occupational_info: During the summers I fight fire for the Forest Service in the Intermountain West saving property from destructive wildland fire. I save my earnings to pay for college. I will be graduating in Finance B.S. this December.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I must
lender.occupational_info: I sit in a dark, underground room and watch TVs all night.

lender.name: Ali MacKenzie
lender.loan_because: It assuages my guilt somewhat

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: my small contributions can make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Customer service.

lender.name: Khizer
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute my success with those who have the talent and passion to do something but do not have enough resources. As a Muslim its a teaching from Al Quraan that help needy people and you will get a reward of 700% in this and hereafter life !!
lender.occupational_info: Working in TecnoShift Saudi Arabia as Director. www.TecnoShift.com

lender.name: Semantic
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate at Semantic, and we'd like to share a little of that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: We design and develop web sites for companies in the UK, and around the world.

lender.name: Nadeera
lender.loan_because: To help others, as God has helped us

lender.name: Fery and Tina
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who have nice job
lender.occupational_info: I am only blogger in the universe and my girlfriend is in culinary especially in bakery and cookies

lender.name: George & Fab
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed & want to give hard working people a hand up!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is a good way to support others.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I love you! I hope this money helps you to pursue things that make you happy and well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a performing singer and songwriter. I am also writing a book.

lender.name: The King Family
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us in many ways and it is a privilege to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a church and my wife works in adoption.

lender.name: Deona and Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: MaryAlice
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-credit is one of the best ways to promote development because it allows individuals make decisions for their future based on their own values and priorities. .... And, most importantly, because I believe in women!

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: One should help those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting all day by a computer, answering emails, chatting and answering on the phone, helping people who have questions or problems.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I really like the idea of entrepreneurship, responsibility, autonomy and thus dignity and not charity. To pay it forward.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It is important that people are able to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law office full-time but also grow herbs and flowers. Part-time I travel to different locations to marry people. I also volunteer for animal rescue organizations.

lender.name: Bowen Island Family
lender.loan_because: To help them have as good a life as they can have.
lender.occupational_info: Work for the parents, school for the children, and all trying to build a small farm to have good, healthy food.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand how NGOs and Western Politics can really screw things up and waste funds... I trust people not bureaucracies...
lender.occupational_info: Emergency Services Worker Canada.

lender.name: Kristof
lender.loan_because: Having had the fortunate destiny to being born in an industrialized part of the world with high living standards, hence hardly challenged by existential fears, I feel to have the duty to support people who have not been that fortunate in their place of birth.
lender.occupational_info: Always studying... :)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I came from a similar background
lender.occupational_info: Making a difference starts with you

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together, and I respect people who work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I write books used by students to learn about history, geography, art, literature, health, and science.

lender.name: Chris from North York
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Business and IT Consulting

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurship to change a person's life and make it better. Do that for enough people and you can change a whole country and the world.
lender.occupational_info: American students work with my organization to find opportunities to study in foreign countries. We have programs in England, Ireland, France, Spain, Germany, the Netherlands, Italy, South Africa, Morocco, Argentina, Chile, Ecuador, India, China, Japan, Australia and New Zealand.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Love is for everyone, no exceptions.

lender.name: Melisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. As an entrepreneur I know how it feels to need funding.
lender.occupational_info: I want to give and make a difference.

lender.name: naomi
lender.loan_because: I wish I could do more...but I hope that my small donations make a difference

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe one person, one group, one loan can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: AdamVonWillis
lender.loan_because: I love you.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve other peoples daily jobs and make their activities easier.

lender.name: Roz
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed help - now, it's my turn to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Teach faculty how to use technology effectively in the classroom.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.occupational_info: I help special needs students learn computer and office skills and also teach Economics.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I support small businesses and have seen the impact that microloans have on small business owners through my time volunteering in the Dominican Republic.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses save time and money by utilizing online marketing tools.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Our mission for oceansgarden.com is to help the fishermen in the fishing villages where we buy their live fish for our website
lender.occupational_info: We import and sell live marine aquarium fish from around the world in a socially and environmentally responsible fashion.

lender.name: Cayetano
lender.loan_because: Me encanta este sistema de ayudar a la gente a ayudarse a si mismas por que no tiene los efectos perversos de otra forma de beneficencia
lender.occupational_info: Trabajo en una farmacia donde sobre todo fabricamos y vendemos medicamentos

lender.name: pedro
lender.loan_because: Much has been given to me. I want to give to others. I love helping people. It feels good to be able to make a difference in someone's life with so little.Dios me a bendecido con una gran vida buena. esposa. hijos buenos. buen trabajo. i buena salud que mas queda, mas que ayudar a mis projimos. i que dios los bendiga a todos............much love

lender.name: Dora Pires
lender.loan_because: To help improve people lifes and dreams

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: To encourage!
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: i just can!!!
lender.occupational_info: trying to make Leeds a safer place!!
